name: Find the Flippin Path
description:
This is our entry to the Brackeys 2021.2 Game Jam,

The theme of the jam is Let There Be Chaos and the rules provided for one week to create the game.

You, a solitary penguin, some how end up stuck on a platform and the only way out is across a series of colored tiles. Can you find your way to the end?  But wait, it's not that easy. The tiles will do their best to thwart you... as only tiles can do. They flip obscuring and changing the path with every move. 

Instructions and hints within the game.

There's also an associated Dev Log on You Tube. A link to the Dev Log is in the game.
